I would recommend "The Amazing Spider-Man". It is a superhero movie directed by Sam Raiman and Paul Thomas Anderson. The movie stars Andrew Garfield as Peter Parker/Spider-Man, Emma Stone as Gwen Stacy, Jon Favreau as Happy Hogan, Zendaya as Spider Girl, Frank Conroy as Mr. Fantastic, Steve Ditko as Doctor Strange, Terence Hairey as Human Torch, Al Danziger as Specter, James Denton as Green Goblin.
The movie tells the story of Peter Parker, a nerdy high school student from New York City. One day, while he is walking home after school, he gets bitten by a spider. The spider's venom has a strange effect on him - he gains incredible strength and agility, along with the ability to shoot webs like a spider. He also gain super speed that allow him to move incredibly fast.
Peter Parker, now known as Spider-Man, decides to keep his secret identity a secret from most of the world. Instead, he focuses on using his incredible powers to fight crime in New York City.
